    • 方法详细资料

      • onVersion

        void onVersion​(boolean hasNewVersion,
               boolean forceUpdate,
               java.lang.String pkgVersion,
               java.lang.String description)
        has it new version?
        参数:
        hasNewVersion - true-have new version, false-no
        forceUpdate - force update system
        pkgVersion - version of new fota package
        description - description of new fota package

      • onVersionError

        void onVersionError​(boolean hasNewVersion,
                    int errorCode)
        has it new version?
        参数:
        hasNewVersion - true-have new version, false-no
        errorCode - 8:no space

      • onDownloadProgress

        void onDownloadProgress​(int progress)
        download progree
        参数:
        progress - 0-100

      • onDownloadError

        void onDownloadError​(int errCode)
        download failed
        参数:
        errCode - {0-storage space is not enough, 1-network error}

      • onDownloadFinish

        void onDownloadFinish()
        new fota package download finish!

        参数:
        progress - 0-100
